author: John T. Howard "Far Sighted"

review: It plays back Netflix very choppy. Upon looking at the bandwidth utilization, it for some reason is unable to keep up with the output from my router. Multiple other machines sitting next to it or in close proximity work flawlessly. Considering going back to my Chromecast. Perhaps Amazon should stick to Kindles and selling other people's products, not manufacturing their own.
author: Claudius Van Rubenstein

review: Easy set up. Great when paid with Plex App to watch your own videos.  Excellent product.  Highly recommend.
